Features.title: Features
Features.description: FlexiHi offers a range of features and benefits to help you manage your inventory and sales with ease.

feature1.title:
Advance Inventory
Management System
feature1.description: Keep track of your inventory and make sure that you always have the products available for your customers. Our inventory management system can help you to manage and organize your inventory, so you never run out of stock and can easily track your products.

feature2.title: Employee Management
feature2.description: This feature allows you to manage employees efficiently using the POS system. You can add new employees, assign roles and permissions, and track their work hours and performance with ease.

feature3.title: Advance Reporting
feature3.description: Obtain valuable insights into your sales performance to identify growth opportunities and areas for improvement. The system provides comprehensive real-time reporting on sales, inventory and customer data, allowing you to make decisions to improve your sales performance.

feature4.title: Multi-store Management
feature4.description: Easily manage inventory levels, products, pricing, and promotions across different locations from a single dashboard. Whether you have two stores or twenty, FlexiHi simplifies multi-store management and helps you manage your inventory and sales effectively.

feature5.title: Invoices & Quotations
feature5.description: You can easily create and send customized  invoices and quotes for your brand. With just a few clicks, track all your transactions and payment statuses, and send reminder notifications to customers about due payments. Say goodbye to manual invoicing and quotation processes and hello to efficiency and accuracy with FlexiHi!

feature6.title: Installment Management
feature6.description: You can easily set up and manage installment plans for your customers, making it easier for them to make purchases while spreading out payments over time.  Our system allows you to create customized installment plans based on your business needs, set payment schedules, track payment statuses, and send reminders.

feature7.title: Point of Sale System (Cashier)
feature7.description: You can manage your sales, from issuing quotes and invoices to selling products, completing the payment process, and tracking sales and profitability in real time. We offers a convenient and flexible solution for businesses to manage their sales.

feature8.title: Loyalty & Promotion Management
feature8.description: You can manage loyalty programs and promotions, ensuring seamless engagement with your customers. With FlexiHi, you can simplify your promotions, track customer loyalty, and increase sales. Now,  create customized promotions and rewards programs for your customers.

FAQs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQs.description: Description Description Description Description Description Description Description

0.question: What kind of hardware can work with FlexiHi POS software?
0.answer: The FlexiHi POS software can work with barcode scanners, receipt printers, cash drawers, and other similar hardware. You can use it on iPads and Android tablets, but they need to meet certain requirements. For more details, you can contact the sales team.

1.question: The FlexiHi POS software works offline?
1.answer: Yes, the FlexiHi POS software works offline. Your device can still make sales and manage shifts even without an internet connection. However, some features like refunds, new customer registration, and a few others won't work or will be limited while offline.

2.question: Does FlexiHi POS software have the functionality of loyalty cards?
2.answer: Yes, FlexiHi POS software has a built-in loyalty program. You can give your regular customers loyalty cards with a printed barcode. When they visit your store, the cashier can scan the barcode to identify them. You can also identify customers by their phone number.

3.question: Do I need to have a deep understanding of accounting to work with FlexiHi POS Software?
3.answer: You don't need to have a deep understanding of accounting to work with FlexiHi POS software. It has an easy-to-use interface that suits all users, along with advanced tools to help experts complete their tasks professionally.

4.question: Can I record expenses on the FlexiHi POS software?
4.answer: Yes, you can record expenses on the FlexiHi POS software. FlexiHi has an Expenses feature that makes it easy and accurate to track your costs and spending.

5.question: Does FlexiHi POS software supply the cashier devices?
5.answer: Yes, we provide the business owner with a cashier device, a barcode reader, cash drawer, printers, and other necessary equipment by discounted prices

6.question: Can i get a trail version before I subscribe?
6.answer: There are several demos available where you can explore the whole system before subscribing.
